Description: Limestone Naukratic figure: draped and reclining; head lost; traces of red on the shoulders.
Curator's comments: Reclining and robed unprovenanced (Cypriot) example in the Louvre (no. MN1408, Karageorghis 1984, pl.42.1-2). Unrobed examples from Naukratis in the British Museum (AES90343; AES90345). Bibliography: Karageorghis, V. 1984, 'Dionysiaca and erotica from Cyprus'. Report of the Department of Antiquities, Cyprus 1984: 214-220.
